name: TrueSight Pulse Storm
description: Displays metrics from Storm Nimbus server

paramSchema.title: Topologies Filter
paramSchema.name: topologies_filter
paramSchema.description: Select topologies (by name or id) to show metrics for. If empty, it will show all topologies.

paramSchema.title: Show Bolts
paramSchema.name: show_bolts
paramSchema.description: Show metrics for each bolt in each topology.

paramSchema.title: Show Spouts
paramSchema.name: show_spouts
paramSchema.description: Show metrics for each spout in each topology.

paramSchema.title: Poll Interval (ms)
paramSchema.name: pollInterval
paramSchema.description: How often (in milliseconds) should the plugin poll for metrics

paramSchema.title: Source
paramSchema.name: source
paramSchema.description: The source to display in the legend for the metric data.
